name: Vibrant Smoothie Bowl
description: A nutritious and vibrant breakfast bowl to start your day right.

steps.text: Combine spinach, banana, and almond milk in a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a bowl and add your favorite toppings.

name: Grilled Salmon & Asparagus
description: A simple yet elegant salmon dish, perfectly flaky and tender.

steps.text: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Place salmon and asparagus on a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until the salmon is cooked through.

name: Fresh Fruit Parfait
description: A layered delight of yogurt, fruits, and granola.

steps.text: In a glass, layer yogurt, berries, and granola.
Repeat the layers until the glass is full.
Serve immediately for the best texture.

name: Tofu & Veggie Stir-fry
description: A quick, flavorful, and healthy weeknight dinner.

steps.text: Cut fresh vegetables on a cutting board.
Stir-fry tofu in a hot pan until golden brown.
Add vegetables and cook until tender-crisp, then add soy sauce.

name: Gourmet Avocado Toast
description: A classic breakfast with a gourmet twist.

steps.text: Toast the bread to your liking.
Mash the avocado and spread it evenly on the toast.
Top with a poached egg and a sprinkle of seasonings.

name: Classic Chicken Salad
description: A light and refreshing salad with grilled chicken.

steps.text: In a large bowl, combine the mixed greens and sliced cucumber.
Add the sliced grilled chicken on top.
Drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette just before serving.

name: Hearty Lentil Soup
description: A warm and comforting soup, rich in plant-based protein.

steps.text: Sauté onion and carrots in a large pot until soft.
Add lentils and vegetable broth, then bring to a boil.
Simmer for 25-30 minutes until the lentils are tender and serve.

name: Colorful Buddha Bowl
description: A balanced and nourishing meal in a single bowl.

steps.text: Arrange the cooked quinoa, chickpeas, and fresh spinach in a bowl.
Drizzle generously with tahini dressing.
Serve either warm or cold.

name: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
description: A light, low-carb alternative to traditional pasta.

steps.text: Gently sauté the zucchini noodles for 2-3 minutes until just tender.
Toss with pesto sauce and halved cherry tomatoes.
Serve immediately.

name: Hummus & Veggie Platter
description: A perfect appetizer or light lunch for sharing.

steps.text: Spread the hummus on a large platter or plate.
Arrange the sliced vegetables and pita bread around the hummus.
Serve as a healthy and easy appetizer.

name: Yogurt with Fresh Berries
description: A simple, healthy, and delicious breakfast or snack.

steps.text: Place the Greek yogurt in a bowl.
Top with your favorite fresh berries.
If desired, drizzle with a small amount of honey before serving.

name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
description: A refreshing salad with vibrant vegetables.

steps.text: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Toss to combine and serve immediately.
